name: raster-vector-example
description: Using [d3-tile](https://github.com/d3/d3-tile) to display raster image tiles underneath a [CSV dataset](https://github.com/d3/d3-dsv) of point locations (U.S. state capitals), and [d3-zoom](https://github.com/d3/d3-zoom) for pan & zoom. See also the [TopoJSON version](/mbostock/5342063) and the [static version](/mbostock/94b9fd26e12c586f342d).
author: Harry Stevens <harryjosephstevens@gmail.com> (http://harryjstevens.com/)
